funding_source.fundee: Bruno Cruz, Cindy Poo, Tiffany Ona

calibrations.description: Water calibration for Lick spout. The input is the valve open time in seconds and the output is the volume of water delivered in microliters.

camera.name: Bottom face Camera
camera.notes: The targe is top of the body

daqs.name: harp_lickometer
daqs.notes: Lick sensor with low noise artifacts; https://github.com/AllenNeuralDynamics/harp.device.lickety-split

daqs.name: Stepper driver
daqs.notes: Stepper driver for positioning the lick spout and the odor tubes; https://allenneuraldynamics.github.io/Bonsai.AllenNeuralDynamics/articles/aind-manipulator.html

lick_sensor.name: harp_lickometer
lick_sensor.notes: Lick sensor with low noise artifacts; https://github.com/AllenNeuralDynamics/harp.device.lickety-split

reward_spouts.name: Lick spout
reward_spouts.notes: Lick spout for water delivery, the tube is ordered from McMaster, cut to size and shaped by AIND
